alert.note: Alert for Colbert; Franklin (Alabama) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued September 03 at 12:38PM CDT by NWS Huntsville
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southwestern Colbert and northwestern Franklin Counties through 130 PM CDT... At 1237 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 9 miles east of Tishomingo State Park, moving northeast at 5 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Cherokee, Pleasant Site, Posey Loop, Mynot, Mt Hester, Cedar Creek Reservoir, Srygley Church and Maud. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Frequent cloud to ground lightning is occurring with this storm. Lightning can strike 10 miles away from a thunderstorm. Seek a safe shelter inside a building or vehicle.
